home.title: ZenDo
home.subtitle: Smart Task Management Platform
home.heroDescription: ZenDo is a modern task management application that supports real-time sync, file attachments, and team collaboration. Focus on what matters and boost your productivity.
home.featuresSubtitle: We've carefully designed every feature to make task management more efficient than ever
home.realtimeSyncDesc: Changes on any device sync instantly to all other devices, keeping you productive anywhere
home.fileAttachmentsDesc: Add file attachments to tasks, all files securely stored in the cloud and never lost
home.teamCollaborationDesc: Real-time team member status, support task assignment and collaboration for higher efficiency
home.priorityManagementDesc: Smart priority system helps you focus on the most important tasks and manage time effectively
home.dataSecurityDesc: Enterprise-level security, encrypted data storage, supports Google and email login
home.crossPlatformDesc: Supports Web and mobile, responsive design adapts to all screen sizes
home.improveEfficiencyDesc: Smart task sorting and reminder features help you focus on what matters most
home.zeroLearningDesc: Intuitive interface design that even beginners can quickly master
home.freeTrialDesc: Free version includes all core features, perfect for individuals and small teams
home.testimonial1: ZenDo has completely changed how I work. Real-time sync keeps me closely connected with my team even when working from home.
home.testimonial2: As a freelancer, I need to manage multiple projects. ZenDo's priority features help me better organize my time.
home.testimonial3: Clean and beautiful interface, powerful yet not complex. Our team's efficiency has improved significantly.
